name: GM Genius
description:
GM Genius is the only fantasy football scholarship competition. It combines a free, fun fantasy football game with the chance to win over $25,000 in college scholarships, Amazon gift cards, and other prizes!

Everyone loves GM Genius. 96% of users would recommend it, and over 90% said it improved their fantasy skills and the way they think. In addition, ESPN, RotoWire, and other media have raved about it, and it recently won the Rookie of the Year Award from the Fantasy Sports Trade Association.

Playing GM Genius is simple, fun, and free! You can play alone in a public league or compete in a private league against friends. Each week of the 2018 NFL season, you’ll complete these three steps: (1) watch brief videos with expert decision-making strategies to give you an edge in fantasy football and in life, (2) answer a few quick questions, and then (3) set your lineup in our unique, award-winning fantasy football game. The game focuses just on the top players at the skill positions, so you don’t have to be a fantasy expert to win!

Anyone ages 13-22 can win lots of amazing prizes, including Amazon gift cards for top scores each week and scholarships for top scorers at the end of the season.
GM Genius is run by How I Decide Foundation (howidecide.org), an educational nonprofit focused on improving decision making and critical thinking in youth.
